translations.chinese: 君王為人不忍，汝入以劍舞，因擊沛公，殺之。
translations.english: The lord is a man without mercy. You enter and perform the sword dance, then take advantage to strike Pei Gong and kill him.
If not, you and your clan will soon be his captives."
Xiang Zhuang entered and made a toast.

translations.chinese: 壽畢，曰：「軍中無 以為樂，請以劍舞。」
translations.english: When the toast was finished, he said: "There is nothing to provide entertainment in the army. Please allow me to perform the sword dance."
So he drew his sword and began to dance.
